Name: Gear Path
About the game: This is a small platformer Metroidvania-like game with exploring and power-ups. It's perfect for playing while waiting for another game. Please note that Gear Path is not an AAA project and it doesn't contain lootboxes. I love creating small games with simple mechanics. I hope you'll like it. If you found a bug or there's something wrong with the game, please contact me through Twitter or the forums. Thanks for your time. GooDCrafter Small nice game, perfect for playing while waiting for another one. 5 main and 6 bonus power-ups which will help you defeat Ancient Evil Robots. The game can be finished in less than an hour. Steam achievements (easy to get 100%). Doesn't contain lootboxes. Trading cards (plus emoticons and profile wallpapers) Steam Cloud. 4 enemy types, ~100 Ancient Evil Robots, 1 Princess, 11 Power-ups, 1 Hell dash, 1 Space Castle Station, 1 Hero, 5 Achievements, 0 Lootboxes, 1 EPIC BACKGROUND WITH NEBULA AND STARS.
Meta Title: Gear Path: Dec 20, 2017, GooDCrafter and Full Overview
